title: FS: 8 card Sovereign lot with Marquard
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: 8 card Sovereign lot with Marquard
posts.post_content:
Asking $350 OBO delivered (paypal preferred) for these nine.  Nice big scans for your review.  Willing to listen to offers:

Harry LumleyS150
Rube Marquard (Hands At Thighs)S150
Danny Murphy (Batting)S350
Red Murray (Portrait)S460
Admiral Schlei (Portrait)S460
"Happy" SmithS460
Jeff SweeneyS350
Jake WeimerS150
